Amphibian.name: Amphibian
Amphibian.description:
Beasts which dwell within or nearby water. Amphibians are typically dexterous, but some varieties are powerful or large in size.

  • Size: variable

  • Stride: variable

Arachnid.name: Arachnid
Arachnid.description:
Beasts from the arachnid family which spin webs to ensnare and prey upon small creatures or insects. Arachnids are typically dexterous and patient, but some varieties favor power or aggression.

  • Size: variable

  • Stride: variable

Boar.name: Boar
Boar.description: Mammals with thick hide, dangerous tusks, and a powerful low-seated center of mass.

Crystal Spider.name: Crystal Spider
Crystal Spider.description: Arachnid comprised of or encrusted in refractive crystalline plates and formations.

Drake.name: Drake
Drake.description:
Serpentine creatures which are lesser kin of dragons. Drakes generally live and hunt in packs, unlike more solitary full dragons. Drakes range from younger and smaller varieties often called "Drakelings" to huge specimens sometimes referred to as "Ultra Drakes".

Observed size variations include:

  • Drakeling: Size 3, Stride 10

  • Drake: Size 6, Stride 16

  • Ultra Drake: Size 9, Stride 12

Different types of Drakes feature a different range of damage resistances and vulnerabilities depending on their sub-species.

Earth Elemental.name: Earth Elemental
Earth Elemental.description: Elemental creatures corresponding to the element of Earth.

Fire Elemental.name: Fire Elemental
Fire Elemental.description: Elemental creatures corresponding to the element of Fire.

Frost Elemental.name: Frost Elemental
Frost Elemental.description: Elemental creatures corresponding to the element of Frost.

Hobgoblin.name: Hobgoblin
Hobgoblin.description: Hobgoblins are humanoids which typically congregate in martial societies which are orderly and disciplined. Hobgoblins are both cunning and uncompromising, making dangerous foes or powerful allies.

Hyena.name: Hyena
Hyena.description: Mammals from the hyena family. Hyenas are carnivorous pack hunters with powerful necks and jaws.

Ogre.name: Ogre
Ogre.description: Hulking giantkin which are reknowned for their brute strength and direct problem-solving approach.

Rodent.name: Rodent
Rodent.description: Beasts which typically congregate in high populations in and around humanoid settlements and are opportunistic scavengers.

Skeleton.name: Skeleton
Skeleton.description: Malevolent undying creatures brought to life by necromancy, created from the skeletal remains of long-dead humanoids. Driven by unholy forces beyond their control, @ref[name] rarely exist of their own accord, and are often encountered as the minions of evil spellcasters and greater undead.

Slime.name: Slime
Slime.description: Creatures made primarily of gelatinous material. They are generally slow, small in size, and incapable of spellcasting or speech. Some exceptions have been documented with variations of slimes which are large, fast, or capable of communication.

Storm Elemental.name: Storm Elemental
Storm Elemental.description: Elemental creatures corresponding to the element of Lightning.

War Machine.name: War Machine
War Machine.description: Constructs built for the purpose of being instruments of war or formidable guardians.

Werewolf.name: Werewolf
Werewolf.description: Lycanthropic shapeshifters who walk as men but take wolven form.

Winged Terror.name: Winged Terror
Winged Terror.description: Monstrous creatures that rule the skies and prey upon those bel0w.

Zombie.name: Zombie
Zombie.description: The shambling corpses of the restless dead, their still-rotting bodies bloated with putrescence. They move without regard for the wounds they sustain and seek only mindless consumption.
